name: Diplomat's Pack
description: A sophisticated kit for diplomats and noble travelers, containing writing supplies and fine clothing. Unpacking equips a backpack and places all contents inside it.
notes: Contains: Backpack, Map and Scroll Case (2), Fine Clothes, Rations (2 days), Ink Bottle, Ink Pen (5), Lamp, Oil (4 flasks), Paper (5 sheets), Parchment (5 sheets), Perfume Vial, Tinderbox
Must not be wearing a backpack to unpack
Unpacking equips backpack and places contents inside
Single use item - consumed when unpacked
